articles.description: The model, 29, who identifies as pansexual, said she saw her sisters Chloe, 37, and Poppy, 35, as the 'epitome of the woman I wanted to be'.
articles.content:
Cara Delevingne has said that her sisters Chloe, 37, and Poppy, 35, 'did their best to be there' for her as she admitted 'growing up as a queer child was isolating and hard to navigate at times'.

articles.title: All Freeview, Sky Q, and Virgin viewers will see a long-awaited channel return this week - Express
